data.lyric:
[ti:I Hope You're Happy Now]
[ar:Carly Pearce/Lee Brice]
[al:I Hope You’re Happy Now]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]I Hope You're Happy Now - Carly Pearce/Lee Brice
[00:02.82]Lyrics by：Carly Pearce/Luke Combs/Randy Montana/Jonathan Singleton
[00:05.64]Composed by：Carly Pearce/Luke Combs/Randy Montana/Jonathan Singleton
[00:08.47]It's all on me it's my mistake
[00:12.84]I said I don't love you a little too late
[00:17.52]But I guess there ain't ever a right time
[00:21.38]And I don't know why it's called a goodbye
[00:26.95]Go run my name into the ground
[00:31.16]Tell everyone you know just how
[00:35.78]How I slammed the door on our forever
[00:39.81]But I promise you it's for the better
[00:44.52]I hope you find what you were looking for
[00:52.73]I hope your heart ain't hurting anymore
[01:00.34]And you get moving on all figured out
[01:05.30]And you don't hate me somehow
[01:09.89]'Cause I hope you're happy now
[01:22.04]Who knew this heart could break this hard
[01:26.05]Or a love like ours could fall apart
[01:30.85]Without so much as a warning
[01:34.82]I thought that I was what you wanted
[01:39.38]Well I guess you found what you were looking for
[01:47.75]I guess my heart ain't worth it anymore
[01:56.02]I'm a wreck I'm a mess
[02:00.29]And I ain't got nothing left
[02:04.58]And so I hope you're happy now
[02:17.88]I hope you find what you were looking for
[02:26.47]I guess my heart ain't worth it anymore
[02:33.94]Hope you get moving on all figured out
[02:39.00]And you don't hate me somehow
[02:42.73]I'm a wreck I'm a mess
[02:47.03]And I ain't got nothing left
[02:51.27]So I hope you're happy now
[02:59.35]Happy now
[03:01.81]Oh I hope you're happy now
data.trans:
[ti:I Hope You're Happy Now]
[ar:Carly Pearce/Lee Brice]
[al:I Hope You’re Happy Now]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:02.82]//
[00:05.64]//
[00:08.47]全都怪我 都是我的错
[00:12.84]我说我不爱你 已经太迟了
[00:17.52]可我想再也找不到合适的时机
[00:21.38]我不知道这为何叫做道别
[00:26.95]听说你四处提起我的名字
[00:31.16]告诉每一个你认识的人 我伤害了你
[00:35.78]我是如何将你拒之门外 葬送我们的未来
[00:39.81]可我向你保证 这是为了我们好
[00:44.52]我希望你能如愿以偿
[00:52.73]我希望你再也不会肝肠寸断
[01:00.34]你会放下这段感情 明白我用心良苦
[01:05.30]不知何故 你不再埋怨我
[01:09.89]因为我希望你幸福快乐
[01:22.04]谁曾预料 我的心饱受煎熬
[01:26.05]抑或是像我们之间的爱情也会分崩离析
[01:30.85]毫无征兆 让我措手不及
[01:34.82]我曾以为我是你此生唯一
[01:39.38]我想你已经如愿以偿
[01:47.75]我想我的心配不上拥有你的爱
[01:56.02]我已经崩溃 思绪混乱
[02:00.29]我已经一无所有
[02:04.58]如今我只希望你幸福快乐
[02:17.88]我希望你能如愿以偿
[02:26.47]我想我的心配不上拥有你的爱
[02:33.94]希望你放下这段感情 明白我用心良苦
[02:39.00]不知何故 你不再埋怨我
[02:42.73]我已经崩溃 思绪混乱
[02:47.03]我已经一无所有
[02:51.27]如今我只希望你幸福快乐
[02:59.35]过得幸福就好
[03:01.81]如今我只希望你幸福快乐
